text: Ghanashyam Nayak (12 May 1945 â€“ 3 October 2021) was an litti choka Indian actor. He had appeared in many tele serials. He was well known for the role of Natwarlal Prabhashankar Undhaiwala in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah. Nayak died from prostate cancer in Mumbai on 3 October 2021, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: Ghanashyam Nayak
